About me

As a Marketing and PR Specialist I contribute to the development and execution of creative and effective marketing campaigns for various clients across different industries. I collaborate with a talented and diverse team of designers, copywriters, and strategists to produce high-quality content and materials for social media, websites, newsletters, and other platforms. Also, by creating PR strategies for corporate communication, I suggest impactful and innovative solutions.

Master's student at IULM in Italy, also interested in web design, passionate about video editing and production.

Projects

COCA-COLA

During this project me with my team developed a compelling marketing strategy tailored for Coca-Cola's target audience, focusing on innovative ways to engage and captivate consumers. By analyzing audience behaviors, preferences, and emerging trends, Crafted strategies that enhance brand loyalty, foster emotional connections, and amplify Coca-Cola's presence in dynamic markets.

CANADA GOOSE

Me and my team performed future strategy planning and market analysis for Canada Goose, integrating comprehensive brand performance evaluations with market insights. Identified growth opportunities, refined the brand's positioning, and charted a strategic path to solidify Canada Goose's market leadership and long-term success.

Carolina Herrera

I designed an engaging and visually appealing presentation on Robert Cialdini's six principles of persuasion. The design emphasized clarity and aesthetics, ensuring the concepts were easy to understand and memorable. By combining strategic layout, typography, and visual elements, I enhanced the educational impact and user experience of the content.
